name: rawst-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is burned, it consumes this item to cure the burn. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures a burn.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when burned to cure a burn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.
